title: Honour Update !!!

embed.description: Honor Update: Live in OCE on Patch 7.12

body:
I just saw on the front page of Reddit that Leauge of Legends OCE has uploaded a video around 3 hours ago regarding the Medieval Twitch and this other legacy Warwick skin that was attainable through their refer a friend programme. 

Does anyone know anything about this new update and how it works?

replies.body: I'm pretty sure it's through the Honour Capsule system which requires you to have Honour Level 3+

It is indeed through the "capsules", however I wasn't aware that's what they were called so I just referred to them as "hextech chests", since that's what they look like.

That said, you can see exactly how the system works and the rewards you can get through the Honour Update page here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor
Is there an article not on that cancer website?
